body.bio: Professionally, I develop web sites and web applications using industry grade technologies and practices. I am forever passionate and innovative about learning new technology and expanding my knowledge. I'm married and a proud father, I enjoy listening to jazz music while programming.
body.edu: Originally trained as a Marine Biotechnologist  at University of Asmara, later on switched career to follow my passion technology and the world of programming.
